intro.bienvenida: We welcome you to travel assistance
intro.bienvenida2: that protects moments worth living with global coverage

registro.texto1: By pressing Continue, you confirm that you accept the
registro.texto2: Conditions of Use of Continental Assist
registro.texto3: . We will manage the information as described in the Privacy Policy and the Cookies Policy
registro.texto4: To enter the application you must have a voucher and prior registration by the Continental Assist team
registro.hemosEncontrado: We have found a voucher with your information, please verify that it is correct and press the 'Confirm' button.
registro.errorMinimo: The phone number must have at least 9 digits
registro.errorMaximo: The phone number must have a maximum of 12 digits

registroCodigo.texto1: We have sent to the email {{data.email}} a 5-digit confirmation code to certify that you are the owner of this email

menu.alertEmergencia: Your plan is not active to report Emergencies

miCuenta.estaSeguroEliminar: Are you sure to delete this phone number?
miCuenta.paraObtener: to get detailed information about your assist

emergencia.paraComunicarte: To communicate with us, you can do it through the following means:
emergencia.numeroNuestra: Number of Our Assistance Center in
emergencia.elNumeroTelefonico: The telephone number of our Assistance Center for the country where you are located is:
emergencia.siNoTeEncuentras2: , you can contact the Assistance Center as indicated in this section
emergencia.numeroNuestraMundo: Number of Our Assistance Center in the World
emergencia.siElServicio: If the telephone service from which the holder called does not allow this call for free, request a collect call for the United States at 786-613-7102. You can also contact us by email at the address:

nuevoReembolso.indiqueAcaInformacion: (Indicate here the information to receive your refund, you must register ALL the necessary data to make a bank transfer)
nuevoReembolso.adjunteaqui: Attach photographs or scans of each of the documents necessary for reimbursement here
nuevoReembolso.laSiguienteDocumentacion: (The following documentation must be attached without exception)
nuevoReembolso.documentacion1: 1. Passport photograph; Sheet with stamps entering and leaving the country
nuevoReembolso.documentacion2: 2. Itinerary of the contracted trip / Photograph of the air tickets and / or any means of international transport.
nuevoReembolso.documentacion3: 3. Bank account details for the transfer. If you do not have one, please present the account information of a duly authorized third party by signed letter.
nuevoReembolso.documentacion5-1: 5. Proof of the bond or relationship (birth certificate only if the person assisted is a minor).
nuevoReembolso.documentacion6-1: 6. Medical notes and / or full medical report of the assistance received.
nuevoReembolso.documentacion4-2: 4. Original proof of expenses on essential items.
nuevoReembolso.documentacion5-2: 5. Settlement (original of the compensation receipt by the airline and / or proof of payment of said compensation or copy of check).
nuevoReembolso.enCasoDemora: In case of baggage delay also attach
nuevoReembolso.enAmbosCasos: In both cases, you must file a complaint with the airline known as PIR (Property Irregularity Report).
nuevoReembolso.elTiempoAproximado: The approximate response time for refunds is 48 hours. If you do not receive a response after that time, contact us.

chat.seleccioneMotivoChat: Select the reason for the chat
